attributes.additional_details: We as a people understand that as a country we have a responsibility to pay off our debts but what we cannot understand is the lack of understanding within the westminister bubble of the need to invest our way out of this recession and for jobs creation , we need a plan for growth not a plan for unemployment , I urge the govt to invest in the infrastructure of this country ,job creation creates wealth which creates tax revenue which shall pay off our debts ,If we can understand that why cant you.
